appName.description: The name (maximum of 45 characters) is the primary identifier of the extension and is a required field.

appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the extension's name.

appDescription.message: Google Books API 経由で本を検索し、検索結果から参考文献のフォーマットで本の情報をコピーします
appDescription.description: A plain text string (no HTML or other formatting; no more than 132 characters) that describes the extension.
